name: MJPEG Lossless Rotate
short_description: MJPEG lossless rotate is a utility to rotate MJPEG Videos by 90 degrees without any loss of quality. Many digital cameras record video using MJPEG. The main purpose of MJPEG lossless rotate is to rotate digital camera videos made in portrait mode.
